Hello !
IKOULA DAYS are back for the third consecutive year. IKOULA offers 3 weeks of promotion on a selection of dedicated servers until november 29th. 

Offer details:
Date: November 09 - November 29, 2021
Discount: 30% lifetime discount on a selection of dedicated servers
Products: Starter IKL / Agile S / Agile S i3 / Agile M Pro v2 / Agile L Pro v2 / Agile XL Pro v2 / Agile XXL Pro v2 / P-Silver Core / P-Gold Core / P-Gold Pro / Power XL Pro / Power M (Classic) / Power L (Classic)
Coupon: IKDAYS21
4 coupons maximum per customer - 400 coupons available

[Visit our website](https://www.ikoula.com/en/dedicated-server?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=let&utm_campaign=ikdays21 "https://ikoula.com/en/dedicated-server?utm_source=forum&utm_medium=let&utm_campaign=ikdays21")


Have a nice day :)
